paper.title: The effect of tax on capital structure under uncertainty: Model and empirical evidence based on prospect theory
paper.abstract: Based on Prospect Theory, a model about statutory tax rate and capital structure is developed and proves to be proper by regression analysis with data from 307 Chinese listed companies from 2001 to 2005. The results show that there is a significantly positive relation between tax rate and the amount of debt if the firm is in a certain circumstances in which the Cognitive Bias on the cost of financial distress(CFD) is not serious so the flrm chooses the optimal capital structure determined by tax benefit and CFD while the relation between them is not significant if the firm is in rather uncertain circumstances, in which the Cognitive Bias is very serious and firm becomes a risk taker and perceives that more debt can create more value, so he will use as much debt as possible without considering the tax benefit.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究税收对资本结构的影响，并基于前景理论建立模型。虽然涉及金融决策，但其核心内容并不直接涉及衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理。
